title: Idea Implemantation
description: Few code junkies who wanted to do something different, went above and beyond holding the idea of creating a coding community where students can get more exposure.

title: Creation of Hackerspace
description: After a lot of difficulties and persistent hard work they successfully created Hackerspace, which back then had a small group of students but none the less as Hackerspace started gaining it's fame

title: Growing the Comunity
description: Right after the orientation, a lot of students joined the community and Hackerspace started growing. A great senior-junior bond is it's forte, surely Hackerspace is a community where students can develop skills in a very friendly environment.
